title: Policy
description: Details for the insurance policy such as type, start date, and ID.

_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the record.

endDate.title: End Date
endDate.description: Date which the insurance policy coverage ended.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: Date which the insurance policy coverage started.

location.title: Location
location.description: Location in which the insurance policy is issued.

type.title: Type
type.description: Type of insurance policy, such as home, automobile, renter, or boat.

assignedBeneficiary.title: Assigned Beneficiaries
assignedBeneficiary.description: Captures the beneficiary(s) assigned to the policy.

hasAssignedBeneficiary.title: Has Assigned Beneficiary
hasAssignedBeneficiary.description: Flag determining if the account has a beneficiary assigned.

owner.title: Owner
owner.description: Stores the policyholder's profile information. Extension of the personal profile details data type.

benefitAmount.title: Benefit Amount
benefitAmount.description: The amount to be paid per the policy terms.
